akn:section.akn:heading: Limitation on the distance between off-premises retailer’s licenses.

akn:content.akn:p: No new off-premises retailers license, class A, shall be issued for an establishment which is located within 400 feet from another establishment operating under an off-premises retailer’s license, class A.

No new off-premises retailers license, class B, shall be issued for an establishment which is located within 400 feet from another establishment operating under an off-premises retailer’s license, class B.
This section shall not prohibit the issuance of a license for an off-premises retailer’s license, Class B, for the sale of alcoholic beverages in an establishment if:
This section shall not prohibit the issuance of a retailer’s license, class A or B, if the:
